media:group.media:title: Blender 3.0 Beginner Compositing Tutorial (Donut part 14)
media:group.media:description:
Blender tutorial on using the built-in compositor to change background colors, add gradients, specular glare, color grading, chromatic aberration and sharpening.

Sign up to Poliigon: Poliigon: http://www.poliigon.com/?utm_campaign=donut3&utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video

Chapter marks:
0:00 Getting started
3:03 Changing the background color
5:45 Creating gradients
10:45 Specular glow
18:05 Color grading
21:34 Chromatic Aberration
23:38 Sharpening
26:38 Isolating the glow
